name: Priya Mehta
bio: Priya is a celebrated bridal and couture designer with over 8 years of experience creating bespoke outfits for weddings and cultural events. Known for her intricate embroidery and attention to detail, she has dressed brides across India and beyond.

reviews.author: Anjali Patel
reviews.comment: Priya designed my wedding lehenga, and it was breathtaking. Every detail was perfect!

reviews.author: Emily Johnson
reviews.comment: She’s an excellent communicator and really understood my vision. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Sofia García
reviews.comment: Priya’s craftsmanship is unmatched. The outfit turned out more stunning than expected.

name: Kenji Tanaka
bio: Kenji fuses traditional Japanese aesthetics with modern streetwear influences. His designs are minimal, functional, and effortlessly stylish — perfect for the global fashion-forward audience.

reviews.author: Hiroshi Sato
reviews.comment: Kenji’s kimono-inspired jackets are brilliant — timeless and modern at once.

reviews.author: Léa Dupont
reviews.comment: Love his craftsmanship. The fit and finishing are impeccable.

reviews.author: Carlos Mendes
reviews.comment: Kenji’s fusion wear stands out on every runway — truly world-class!

name: Amara Bello
bio: Amara is a Nigerian fashion designer redefining modern African wear. Her collections highlight cultural heritage through bold colors, sustainable fabrics, and contemporary silhouettes.

reviews.author: Chinedu Okeke
reviews.comment: Amara made my agbada for a traditional ceremony — flawless craftsmanship!

reviews.author: Jessica Lee
reviews.comment: Loved her use of African prints with modern cuts. It’s elegant and bold.

reviews.author: Ahmed Al-Farsi
reviews.comment: Her outfits celebrate culture beautifully. I wear her designs proudly.

name: Luca Rossi
bio: Luca brings the essence of Italian tailoring into modern fashion. His designs are timeless, refined, and meticulously crafted for both men and women.

reviews.author: Giulia Conti
reviews.comment: Luca’s suits are a work of art — elegant, structured, and perfectly fitted.

reviews.author: Ava Brown
reviews.comment: Very professional and attentive. The quality is top-notch!

reviews.author: Hannah Müller
reviews.comment: Collaborated with Luca on a fashion show — his attention to detail is incredible.
